sentence: North Carolina, South Korea, and why you should Run For Something, with Amanda Litman The Downballot FollowShare 0:0042:43 15301x image/svg+xml Powered by Libsyn Powered by Libsyn We also spend time exploring a trio of different stories out of North Carolinaone concerning Madison Cawthorn, one about redistricting, and one, believe it or not, about Vladimir Putinand bring you up to speed on the just-concluded presidential election in South Korea.

sentence: Co-hosts David Nir and David Beard also recap elections this week in California and Wisconsin; explain why Republicans are finally turning on Madison Cawthorn (it's not really about cocaine and orgies); pick apart a huge blunder that led the first attack ad in Pennsylvania's Democratic primary for Senate getting yanked off the air the very day it debuted; and provide updates on international elections in Hungary and France.
title: The Downballot: How Democrats are fighting to hold the House (transcript)

sentence: The leader of the "Let's Go Brandon" cryptocurrency revealed that Rep. title: Meme coin leader's admission could land Madison Cawthorn in more hot water
